h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)
content: Once you get him to around half his health, he'll suddenly jump backwards in retreat, and start putting his hands together to signal mercy and defeat.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
Once you get him to around half his health, he'll suddenly jump backwards in retreat, and start putting his hands together to signal mercy and defeat.
